title: Ep. 50 - The Delusional Leftist War on Chick-Fil-A
description:
The Left has been having a tantrum over Chick Fil A for years now. Chick Fil A has just ignored them and made no effort to apologize. In the meantime, the company has had enormous success and become one of the most popular restaurants in America. We can learn two important things from this chain of events.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
